osvSchema.details: TOCTOU in the ASP Bootloader may allow an attacker with physical access to tamper with SPI ROM records after memory content verification, potentially leading to loss of confidentiality or a denial of service.

product_data.product_name: Athlon™ 3000 Series Desktop Processors with Radeon™ Graphics “Picasso” AM4
Athlon™ 3000 Series Mobile Processors with Radeon™ Graphics “Dali”/”Dali” FP5
Athlon™ 3000 Series Mobile Processors with Radeon™ Graphics   “Pollock”
Ryzen™ 3000 Series Mobile Processor with Radeon™ Graphics “Picasso” FP5

description_data.value: TOCTOU in the ASP Bootloader may allow an attacker with physical access to tamper with SPI ROM records after memory content verification, potentially leading to loss of confidentiality or a denial of service.

descriptions.value: TOCTOU in the ASP Bootloader may allow an attacker with physical access to tamper with SPI ROM records after memory content verification, potentially leading to loss of confidentiality or a denial of service.

TOCTOU en el ASP Bootloader puede permitir que un atacante con acceso físico altere los registros ROM SPI después de la verificación del contenido de la memoria, lo que podría provocar una pérdida de confidencialidad o una denegación de servicio.
